website_summaries.verdict: Both affordable and easy to use, but they may not provide enough grip for extremely icy/snowy conditions.
pros: Garners praise for how easy they are to put on, adjust, and take off
cons: The tension adjuster must be purchased separately
Not the best choice for severe wintry weather

customer_reviews.title: Vehicle Cable/Chain size and tire size
customer_reviews.text: I like this 1042 particular cable because it fit my 2018 Chevy Malibu Hybrid and it has 13 cross straps instead of 11 or 12 that others have which will lead to better traction, they were easy to install and take off just turn the wheel and it gives ample room to hook the inside and outside wires together . I put some pictures up one has the tire size chart that shows what size tire this cable fits I highlighted my particular tire size. I also purchased a yellow spider bungee sold separately .
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: worked well on minivan
customer_reviews.text: We used these chains this winter for our Honda Odyssey minivan and they worked well. I recommend trying them on your vehicle in dry conditions before you have to use in snow. Obviously it's a little harder putting them on in snowy conditions but still worked okay. We could only drive about 15-20 mph when the chains were on. But we were getting up hills that SUVs and pickups had slid off sideways.
customer_reviews.author: roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Good chains they got us home safely during last weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Good chains they got us home safely during last weeks snow storm in Reno NV. This was used on a scion XB and as far as I can tell it performed well and got my family home safe. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: FTC

customer_reviews.title: Tensioners sold separately are REQUIRED for these cables, they fit very loose.
customer_reviews.text: The cables look fine, well made, fit well but loose. 2 Stars: no hard case, the case is a fabric bag with Velcro too small to get the cables back in after you use them once certainly you won’t be able to stuff them back until you get back home AND you need the tensioners, but have to buy them separately AND the tensioners won’t fit in the flimsy fabric bag with the cables not enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These chains have held up well and survived the whole winter on multiple trips to Tahoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Haines

customer_reviews.title: Fit great seem to be good quality bought the yellow star ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit great seem to be good quality bought the yellow star chain fasteners to tighten them up with be an emergency setup for this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Despite using the sizing chart these were way too big for my 285/30/R18. Had a rather frustrating hour trying to get these on to a low car. Solution was to winterize my Jeep. Had fun actually trying to get it stuck in snow.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bachrach

customer_reviews.title: Yup they fit and they work
customer_reviews.text: I live on the CA side of Donner Pass and was dreading the day when I would be called to the east side. Nothing to it. These slip right on, grip really well, and pack up easily.
customer_reviews.author: IRIDETX

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The 1046 fit my 2017 CRV EX AWD. These chains work great. I use a set of aftermarket tensioners to help keep them snug. I can put A set on in less then 10 minutes with my wife in the driver seat to scoot the vehicle back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and adjust
customer_reviews.text: Cables work well. A huge winter in California. We hadn't needed them ever before (maybe once), but this winter used them twice just to be on the safe side driving through blizzards. They really make one feel a lot safer. Easy to put on and adjust. No need to roll car back and forth like we had to with chains in the good old days
customer_reviews.author: Birdlegs

customer_reviews.title: fit 2009 SX4
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2009 Suzuki SX4 great. The fit chart said they wouldnt but based on tire size they do. I put them on and drove around in the grass to check fit, no issues using them up to 20 mph and turning lock to lock. I'd say they work great and for this type vehicle are better than chains. Dont forget to buy some rubber tensioners.
customer_reviews.author: swampy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire Chains
customer_reviews.text: Fit and worked great; easier to get on and off than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Fred Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Scratched car
customer_reviews.text: A horizontal link broke down on first use and scratched my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty chains
customer_reviews.text: Good chains to have for a passenger car, will take you almost anywhere
customer_reviews.author: cavaliersam

customer_reviews.title: I definitely would recommend purchasing the Tire Chain Rubber Adjuster Spider Bungee with ...
customer_reviews.text: After watching YouTube videos from the Washington State Department of Highway Safety, on how to use chains for your car. I definitely would recommend purchasing the Tire Chain Rubber Adjuster Spider Bungee with you chain order. Fit perfect on my tires, and stayed on with the Chain Rubber Adjuster Spider Bungee.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Doson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure they would have worked fine. I moved out of the snowy area before I ever needed them
customer_reviews.author: mjcali

customer_reviews.title: Quality, affordable, great company!
customer_reviews.text: Had to put chains for the first time . These chains worked very well, they were easy to install and remove. Be careful to not over tighten them, like any chains, it makes it tougher to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Leal

customer_reviews.title: Made my snow driving safe and stress-free
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to install and the price is right when ordered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Aniceto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t needed to install them yet, they look great, not enough snow to require their use.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't  work.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to fit tires tight but shaked extremely and noisy. sound like car being damaged. Unable to use.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID BRUCE BOWALD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cable for my Honda Pilot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it based on the recommendation in my 2014 Honda pilots' mannual. It's easy to install. They also have a YouTube video. Cables are better suited for Honda vehicle as they don't have lot of space between tire and wheel well. It came with a box to store the chain. I'm happy with the purchase. Les Schwab cables are far more expensive when I checked with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Roy

customer_reviews.title: These snapped while I was driving
customer_reviews.text: These snapped while I was driving and did about $3,000 worth of damage to my car.
customer_reviews.author: Reidoo

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Fits my jeep like a glove. Now all I need is snow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Good Tire Cable for a great price, False advertizing
customer_reviews.text: The package includes a pair(2) Tire Cables for 2 tires!!! DOES NOT INCLUDE THE YELLOW ADJUSTERS (these are optional for $14 each) The "Make sure it fits" doesn't work either (it didn't work in my case)!!! You should make sure to check the tire size of the driving tires (FWD or RWD) and refer to the Product Info.
customer_reviews.author: Annn

customer_reviews.title: Initial Dissappointment
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware - Picture shows the yellow rubber piece to hold tension but they are not included. There is no mention in the description, as far as I could see. I cannot review the function of the product yet and didn't double check to make sure there was a pair(just noticed someone else's comment who asked about qty included) I just orded some of those rubber tensioners and now paid wayyyy toooo muchhhh for freight...not happy. I hope you learn from my mistake. Update after use - They function great with the additional yellow rubber slack tensioners
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Warning, no tensioners
customer_reviews.text: Warning, these chains don't come with tensioners. I had to use bungee cords. Who sells tire chains without tensioners? It's very easy to miss on the website.
customer_reviews.author: svatne

customer_reviews.title: Easily fit the Jeep, can't wait to try them in the snow.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to try them in the snow as of yet, but thus far, was able to easily put them on and take them off. You do have to make sure that you use the tire chain adjuster with the changes so that they stay snug on your tires. They fit on my Jeep. They are don't look as "beefy" as some of the other chains, but maybe they will still be fine.
customer_reviews.author: TRFBTop Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: Chains did exactly what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on my 2008 Honda Odyssey. Got them the week before we went up to Tahoe and went up in a great big snow storm. They were no harder to put on than any chains would be out in a snowstorm, and gave plenty of traction. I did get a basic set of chain tighteners to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Professional

customer_reviews.title: I had no problems, item was delivered as promised ...
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems, item was delivered as promised in a timely manner, would order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Daiszey M

customer_reviews.title: Very good construction though
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit on a 1994 Ford F150 tire P235/75R15. Not big enough to connect. But that was my fault for not clearly reading the details and wasn't sure of my tire size at time of purchase. Very good construction though. Will keep and use on another vehicle. Yellow Spider Bungee that is needed will fit inside of case.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Cable chain set for 2006 Honda Rigline
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet, no snow trips. They look like they'll work fine. Just make sure you order by the set/pr. properly. You typically only need one pair per vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: L. Eskaldun

customer_reviews.title: Honda Pilot cable chains
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about three weeks ago and tries them on my vehicle when they arrived.I have a 2015 Honda Pilot and they fit my tires(p235/60/18) perfectly with the recommended bungee tensioner .I looked at my owners manual and these are the exact cable chains that are recommended by Honda in their manual.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great chains. Terribly deceiving picture!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The chains have great overall quality and work well but AMAZON, please change the product picture! These chains DO NOT come with the yellow chain adjuster that is shown. Uncharacteristic of Amazon to do this, I feel a bit deceived and disappointed with what arrived when I opened the box. This knocked a star off of the review for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new item. I haven't been able to try it out yet but great to have on hand when I do need it. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Devlin R. Idell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, they seem pretty well cosnstructed, well worth the price. I just hope I never have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Beard

customer_reviews.title: But look good, I believe it will fit my front wheels
customer_reviews.text: I have not try on my car yet till ice/snow storm. But look good, I believe it will fit my front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Javier J. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Ice and snow cables
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Easy to handle. My mechanic checked them out and totally approved. For a senior lady that's all I needed to know.
customer_reviews.author: pokie1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was trying to get back in the carrying case
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: There like insurance. I haven't had to use them and ...
customer_reviews.text: There like insurance. I haven't had to use them and hope I never do but I'm glad I got them just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Gillum

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these chains because of the design. When they came however, the cool bungie style attacher thingy was missing. The customer service agent couldn't be sure if it came with the chains or not. If it shows it in the picture, I certainly hope so. I've re-ordered them but if the attacher isn't included I'll be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Chain in carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use these yet but I am glad to know that they will be on hand when a big snow comes. We live in the mountains and chains are required after a major storm. The carrying case is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Don's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: tire chains
customer_reviews.text: looks like a good product. Haven't had a chance to try them out. All wheel drives need 2 pair
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Koorn

customer_reviews.title: Photo is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if the chains are good or not (haven't used them yet), however, the photo they show is misleading... it shows the chains with the adjuster, and that is NOT included. It's an optional purchase. The product specifications did not make this clear, either. Aside from that, the tool Amazon used for determining which chains to use on my car (2011 VW Tiguan SEL) was very good.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaC

customer_reviews.title: No spider tensioner it is an optional item why did this not come up when ordering
customer_reviews.text: Got the product took a while not two days. Spider tension-er is an optional part, (not included) if I had known this I would not have ordered the product. Picture is misleading without a note stating the spider is optional.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Brizland

customer_reviews.title: Misadvertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: the chains are good and fit BUT the picture is wrong, the yellow fastner is NOT included! Which was the reason why i bought those specific ones!!
customer_reviews.author: SnowboardDude

customer_reviews.title: Great chains but arrogant seller
customer_reviews.text: Actually the "chain" is fine but the description and the seller Baxter create the single star. Since the description is singular and I could find nothing to counter that I ordered two. Right, I got two sets. No problem with Amazon I requested a return authorization and that was followed by two emails from Baxter that suggested I was not intelligent enough to use chains much less order them. So although it says CHAIN they really mean CHAINS. By the way if you order the ADJUSTER from the same folks note that they actually mean ADJUSTERS and avoid the return and lecture I suffered.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not great makes very loud noise and while driving it's shake the car very bad I thought it's an alternative for snow tires but nothing can beat the snow tires it's very bad and I don't recommend it for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ehab

customer_reviews.title: Forget it
customer_reviews.text: I tried putting this thing on in deep snow, but once big snow is already on the ground, there is practically now way they will stay on the tire. Snow chains may be effective, but not as a temporary solution. They have to be put on well in advance. I think it's best to stick with snow tires and carry a shovel, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Attila

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: it didnt say whether they were pairs or not so i was cross country travelling thru storm brutus and had to have something quick. due my own inability to do some things, i couldnt return them on time and ended up with an excess of 4 pairs of these chain... in sunny florida. sigh. fortunately we didnt need them on the road but i cant vouch for their quality. only that they are sold in pairs, not single chains.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

product_meta.title: Quality Chain Cobra Cable Passenger Snow Traction Tire Chains (1046)
product_meta.description: Size:1046Cobra passenger cable chains are made with tough, low-profile carbon steel rollers to provide traction and long wear. The low-profile of the steel rollers allows increased tire-to-road contact resulting in better stability as well as considerable noise and vibration reduction. These Cobra cable chains are designed for use on cars having minimal clearance availability and original equipment tires with high tread. They are totally galvanized for rust protection and come packed in a plastic box for easy storage. Fits Tire Sizes: 255/45-19, 245/65-15, 265/75-15, 225/70-16, 285/40-17, 235/65-17, 245/65-17, 285/30-18, 275/35-18, 285/35-18, 275/40-18, 275/45-18, 235/50-18, 235/55-18, 255/55-18, 225/60-18, 235/60-18, 225/65-18, 235/710-460, 275/35-19, 285/35-19, 275/40-19, 235/55-19, 265/35-20, 275/35-20, 245/40-20, 225/70-17, 295/50-15, 275/60-15, 235/50-19, 265/35-19, 275/30-20, 255/70-15, 245/45-19, 235/30-22, 245/30-22, 255/30-22, 225/50-19
feature_bullets: Rubber Adjusters Sold Separately (Quality Chain Part# 0212) (Recommended)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
